price: निःसंदेह जन्नती लोग आज (नेमतों) का आनंद लेने में व्यस्त हैं।
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: inna aṣḥāba al-janati al-yawma fī shughulin fākihūna
